Body:
with open('testdata/models/destination_weather_error_invalid_request.json', 'r'
    ) as f:
    expectedResponse = f.read()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://weather.ls.hereapi.com/weather/1.0/report.json',
    expectedResponse, status=200)
product = herepy.WeatherProductType.forecast_7days
name = 'Berlin'
with self.assertRaises(herepy.InvalidRequestError):
    self._api.weather_for_location_name(name, product)
responses.activate
